name: Longhouse
uniques: [+1 Science] from [Forest] tiles [in this city] <after discovering [Education]>

name: Roman Aqueduct
uniques: [40]% Food is carried over after population increases [in this city]

name: Himeji Castle
uniques: May buy [Military] units with [Faith] [in this city]
quote: 'Bushido is realized in the presence of death. This means choosing death whenever there is a choice between life and death. There is no other reasoning.' - Yamamoto Tsunetomo

name: Huey Teocalli
uniques: [+2 Culture, +2 Food] from [Lakes] tiles [in all cities]

name: Mausoleum of Halicarnassus
uniques: Gain [100] [Gold] <upon expending a [Great Person] unit> <(modified by game speed)>
quote: 'The whole earth is the tomb of heroic men and their story is not given only on stone over their clay but abides everywhere without visible symbol woven into the stuff of other men's lives.' - Pericles

name: Theodosian Walls
uniques: All newly-trained [All] units [in this city] receive the [Stratiotiki Ekpaidefsi] promotion

[+1 Faith] from every [Mosque] <starting from the [Medieval era]>
[+1 Food] from every [Pagoda] <starting from the [Medieval era]>
[+1 Gold] from every [Stupa] <starting from the [Medieval era]>

name: The Great Cothon
uniques: New [{Military}, {Water}] units start with [15] XP [in this city]

[+1 Culture, +1 Production] from [Fish] tiles [in this city]
